title: (x) Jones New York logo - Optima {Simon Duckworth}
content:
I have seen it many times so I do not think that it is customized but I cant find out wich font it is.  
Im thankfull for all the help I can get.  
P.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jones\_new\_york.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528090800/http:/typophile.com/files/jones_new_york.jpg) | 52.21 KB |
author: plojel

comments.content:
Hi!

Looks like Optima to me!

Yup, the dreadful original Adobe version with straight sides. Luckily the “Original” from Linotype is a [good digitisation](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528090800/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.120968.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=288&sampleText=N&sampleSize=388).

Thank you very much for your help and fast response!  
P.
